widgetText.widgetTextContent: The #1 Mentorship Program for Female Freelancers
A one-year mentorship program, with hands on support and guidance for freelancers who are serious about growth.
This program is for people who think that freelancing is
The weight of these challenges will gradually lessen, gradually transforming into experiences from which we draw strength and insight.
We develop strategies such as setting clear boundaries, managing workload effectively, and continuously improving time management and organization skills.
We help you find ways to overcome these fears by building a strong client base, honing your skills, and developing effective business strategies.

“I faced all of that
and I survived”
Meet the designer of this program.

I'm a 7-figure freelancer who embarked on this journey with excitement for success. As a Minnesota mom of 3, I dropped out of college and lacked marketing experience. Over 7 years, I scaled my freelancing to multiple 7 figures, collaborating with clients like ClickFunnels, Dean Graziosi, Lionsgate, Cristy CodeRed, and Metricool ....
Empower your online presence with tailored media growth services. Elevate your voice, expand your reach, and thrive in the digital realm.
Build your freelancing network with new and existing members.
With over 180 trainings built for Freelancer growth.
With my amazing coaches who have built 6 figure freelancing businesses - to guide you.
You will have instant clarity on where to focus for growth.
How We Take on the Challenge
A Step-by-step process that we follow to help our clients with their growth journey.

iconListComplete.iconListItemText: Begin by understanding the client's current online presence and goals.
Define clear objectives for media growth, such as increased followers, engagement, or brand recognition.
Identify the target audience and their preferences, behaviors, and demographics.
Tailor content strategies to resonate with the intended audience.
Create a comprehensive content plan that aligns with the client's goals and audience.
Define content themes, formats, and posting schedules for consistency.
Determine the most suitable social media platforms for the client's niche and target audience.
Focus efforts on platforms where the audience is most active.

widgetText.widgetTextContent: Discover the Impact of Media Growth: Hear from Those We've Empowered
Working with FGM has transformed my fitness brand. My Instagram engagement has soared, and I've gained a loyal community of followers who are genuinely interested in my content.
FGM revolutionized my LinkedIn strategy. Their insights on content optimization and networking boosted my profile's visibility, resulting in new connections and even job opportunities.
A big shoutout to FGM for their social media expertise. My travel blog's Twitter presence has exploded, and I've been approached for sponsored travel collaborations!
FGM redefined my digital strategy. Their insights led to a boost in website traffic and conversions. Their expertise is top-notch, and I'm grateful for the positive impact they've had on my brand.
I couldn't be happier with the guidance from FGM. Their advice on email marketing doubled my open rates, and my online store's sales have seen a substantial uptick. Truly impressive!
Thanks to FGM for helping my small business flourish on Facebook. I've witnessed a surge in engagement and website visits. They understand how to harness the power of social media!
